module_system.overview: Modules are the fundamental unit of knowledge and capability in Cortex_2

manifest.purpose: Defines module metadata, dependencies, and behavior

triggers.keyword_triggers: Words that suggest module is needed

identity.persistence: Often kept loaded as base layer

tool.purpose: External tool integration and usage patterns

lifecycle.discovery: System detects need for module through triggers
lifecycle.loading: Module loaded from appropriate storage tier
lifecycle.deactivation: Module marked as inactive but kept in memory
lifecycle.archival: Module compressed and moved to cold storage

best_practices.size: Keep modules focused and under 50k tokens
best_practices.triggers: Design specific but not overly narrow triggers
best_practices.testing: Test loading, triggers, and resource usage
